item.title: Judge rules Columbia activist Mahmoud Khalil can be deported
item.description: Columbia University activist Mahmoud Khalil appeared before an immigration judge in Louisiana on Friday who decided he can be deported.

item.description: President Donald Trump on Friday announced agreements with five law firms for $600 million in pro bono work.

5 of 6 victims of Hudson River helicopter crash were tourists from Spain
item.description: Five of the six victims of the Hudson River helicopter crash in NYC have been identified as Siemens executive Agustin Escobar Canadas and his family.

item.title: RFK Jr. pledges an answer to the 'autism epidemic' by September
item.description: HHS Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said at Thursday’s Cabinet meeting that, by September, his agency will "know what has caused the autism epidemic."

item.title: US, Iran holding make-or-break talks: ANALYSIS
item.description: High-level delegations from the United States and Iran are meeting over the weekend in Oman to discuss Tehran's rapidly advancing nuclear program.
